verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Moab<WH4124>. For in a night<WH3915> Ar<WH6144> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste<WH7703>, and brought to nought<WH1820>; for in a night<WH3915> Kir<WH7024> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste<WH7703>, and brought to nought<WH1820>.

They are gone up<WH5927> to Bayith<WH1006>, and to Dibon<WH1769>, to the high places<WH1116>, to weep<WH1065>: Moab<WH4124> waileth<WH3213> over Nebo<WH5015>, and over Medeba<WH4311>; on all their heads<WH7218> is baldness<WH7144>, every beard<WH2206> is cut off<WH1438>.

In their streets<WH2351> they gird<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth<WH8242>; on their housetops<WH1406>, and in their broad<WH7339> places<WH3213>, every one waileth, weeping<WH1065> abundantly<WH3381>.

And Heshbon<WH2809> crieth<WH2199> out<WH500>, and Elealeh; their voice<WH6963> is heard<WH8085> even unto Jahaz<WH3096>: therefore the armed men<WH2502> of Moab<WH4124> cry aloud<WH7321>; his soul<WH5315> trembleth within him<WH3415>.

My heart<WH3820> crieth out<WH2199> for Moab<WH4124>; her nobles<WH1280> flee unto Zoar<WH6820>, to Eglath<WH5697> - shelishi-yah<WH7992>: for by the ascent<WH5927> of Luhith<WH3872> with weeping<WH1065> they go up<WH4608>; for in the way<WH1870> of Horonaim<WH2773> they raise up<WH5927> a cry<WH2201> of destruction<WH7667>.
For the waters<WH4325> of Nimrim<WH5249> shall be desolate<WH4923>; for the grass<WH1877> is withered away<WH3001>, the tender grass<WH1877> faileth<WH3615>, there is no green thing<WH3418>.
Therefore the abundance<WH3502> they have gotten<WH6213>, and that which they have laid up<WH6486>, shall they carry away<WH5375> over the brook<WH5158> of the willows<WH6155>.
For the cry<WH2201> is gone round about<WH5362> the borders<WH1366> of Moab<WH4124>; the wailing<WH3215> thereof unto Eglaim<WH97>, and the wailing<WH3215> thereof unto Beer-elim<WH879>.

For the waters<WH4325> of Dimon<WH1775> are full<WH4390> of blood<WH1818>; for I will bring<WH7896> yet more<WH3254> upon Dimon<WH1775>, a lion<WH738> upon them of Moab<WH4124> that escape<WH6413>, and upon the remnant<WH7611> of the land<WH127>.
